overview:
Verfirm offers web application technologies to K-12 schools and web solutions for small to medium-sized enterprises.

Our flagship product for schools, the K12 Apps Library Reservation System, was developed with the assistance of school librarians. The Library Reservation System replaces outdated methods of reserving rooms such as scheduling books and spreadsheets. In addition, the application continually updates figures which can be used to measure library attendance and create annual reports and other media.

For enterprises, Verfirm offers network and web application consulting services. Headquartered in metro Philadelphia, we serve clients on a national basis, providing both over the phone and in-person consulting options. Our team of technical experts can assist with both program design and development, from the planning stages to a finished product.
